metadata.feature_description: Performs operations on multiple files or folders simultaneously with progress tracking

steps.action: Navigated to Admin > Content > Assets and opened My Website folder
steps.expected: Multi-Select Mode or checkboxes should be available to select multiple files
steps.actual: No multi-select UI elements found. No checkboxes visible on files or folders. No 'Select All' option present.

steps.action: Attempted Ctrl+Click on multiple files to enable multi-select
steps.expected: Multiple files should be selected simultaneously
steps.actual: Ctrl+Click triggers file download instead of multi-select. No multi-select functionality available.

issues: Multi-Select Mode is not implemented in the UI. The feature description mentions 'Multi-Select Mode' but no such functionality exists in the Assets panel.

steps.action: Searched for bulk delete option in Assets UI
steps.expected: Option to select and delete multiple files at once
steps.actual: Only single-file delete operation available via hover menu (trash icon). No bulk delete functionality.

issues: Bulk delete is not available. Only single-item delete through hover action icons.

steps.action: Searched for bulk move option in Assets UI
steps.expected: Option to select and move multiple files at once
steps.actual: Only single-file move operation available via hover menu (arrow icon). No bulk move functionality.

issues: Bulk move is not available. Only single-item move through hover action icons.

steps.action: Searched for bulk copy option in Assets UI
steps.expected: Option to select and copy multiple files at once
steps.actual: Only single-file copy operation available via hover menu (copy icon). No bulk copy functionality.

issues: Bulk copy is not available. Only single-item copy through hover action icons.

steps.action: Searched for bulk permission change option in Assets UI
steps.expected: Option to modify permissions for multiple files/folders at once
steps.actual: Permissions can only be modified on individual folders through the edit/details panel. No bulk permission change functionality.

issues: Bulk permission changes not available. Permissions are managed per-folder only.

steps.action: Attempted to find progress tracking for operations
steps.expected: Progress indicator should appear during bulk operations
steps.actual: No bulk operations available to test progress tracking. Single-item operations complete immediately without progress tracking.

issues: Cannot test progress tracking because bulk operations are not implemented.

steps.action: Attempted to test partial failure handling
steps.expected: System should handle scenarios where some items in a bulk operation fail while others succeed
steps.actual: Cannot test partial failures because bulk operations are not implemented.

issues: Cannot test partial failure handling because bulk operations are not implemented.

steps.action: Attempted to verify permission requirements for bulk operations
steps.expected: Bulk operations should respect user permissions
steps.actual: Cannot verify bulk operation permissions because bulk operations are not implemented.

issues: Cannot test bulk operation permissions because bulk operations are not implemented.

observations: CRITICAL: The 'Bulk Operations' feature with 'Multi-Select Mode' as described in the feature specification is NOT IMPLEMENTED in the UI.
Code review of AssetsController.cs confirms only single-item API endpoints exist: DeleteFile, DeleteFolder, CopyFile, MoveFile, MoveFolder. No bulk operation endpoints found.
Code review of Assets.js confirms viewModel.selectedItem tracks only a single item. No multi-select state management implemented.
The UI at Admin > Content > Assets shows only 'Add Folder' and 'Add Asset' buttons. No 'Multi-Select Mode' toggle or bulk operations toolbar exists.
Single-item operations (Edit, Move, Copy, Download, Delete) are available via hover action icons on each file/folder card.
Ctrl+Click and Shift+Click do not enable multi-selection - they trigger file download instead.
The feature description mentions 'Multi-Select Mode' location as 'Admin > Content > Assets > Multi-Select Mode' but this UI element does not exist.
